text: Ni shuo:`Zhenzhu a! Guo quan de zhu a! Ni yao ba guo quan shangci shui, jiu shangci shui, ni yao ba guo quan cong shui shouzhong duo qu, jiu cong shui shouzhong duo qu; ni yao shi shui zungui, jiu shi shui zungui, ni yao shi shui beijian, jiu shi shui beijian; fuli zhi you ni zhangwo; ni duiyu wanshi, que shi quanneng de.
